title: What kind of FPS should I be expecting?
body:
I've just got my new system and I'm concerned with the FPS rates

I5-4690
EVGA GTX 970 FTW ACX 2.0
8gb G.Skill 1600mhz ram

I'm getting 9500 on firestrike which seems about right.

I start league with 350 fps, then it drops to 200 when minions spawn/I enter lane.

It's been dropping randomly and giving me stutters when certain things happen

(first it was when I used sweeper, but then that went away, next was lulus ulti, went away.. now when I see baron buff minions, It drops to 130 and I get stutter)

Any clue guys?

replies.body:
Something Riot didn't do quite right. A lot of people, even ones who have military grade gaming systems that Crysis 3 with max. settings runs at about 3,000 FPS are finding they are dropping frames while playing League.

Doesn't seem like it's going to be solved soon, either.

Bleak, isn't it?
